subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The objectives of this project are to support the reform programme of the Malawi Electoral Commission to become a more effective, responsive accountable and credible electoral management organization in Malawi and to provide support to elections in Malawi. The project serves as a mechanism for harmonised donor and government support to the reforms and elections. It provides support for capacity building of the MEC in both the short and long term, support for the establishment of a credible computerized voters’ register, support to elections budget and support to CSOs and the MEC for civic and voter education.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: SUPPORT TO ELECTORAL REFORMS

title: Support to Electoral Reforms and Elections_Phase Two
